name: Another Century's Episode
description:
Another Century's Episode is an action game.
Another Century's Episode is available on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Hiroshi Kosuge and Hiroyuki Goto. Tomohiro Shibuya directed the game. It was scored by Daisuke Matsumoto, Hideyuki Eto, Koichi Suenaga and Kota Hoshino.
